name: Australian dollar
countries: Australia, Australian Antarctic Territory, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Heard and McDonald Islands, Kiribati, Nauru, Norfolk Island, Tuvalu

name: Bermudian dollar (customarily known as Bermuda dollar)
Euro
countries: 16 European Union countries, Andorra, Kosovo, Monaco, Montenegro, San Marino, Vatican City; see eurozone

name: Pound sterling
countries: United Kingdom, Crown Dependencies (the Isle of Man and the Channel Islands), certain British Overseas Territories (South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands, British Antarctic Territory and British Indian Ocean Territory)

name: Norwegian krone
countries: Norway, Bouvet Island, Queen Maud Land, Peter I Island

name: New Zealand dollar
countries: Cook Islands, New Zealand, Niue, Pitcairn, Tokelau

name: New Taiwan dollar
countries: Taiwan and other islands that are under the effective control of the Republic of China (ROC)

name: United States dollar
countries: American Samoa, British Indian Ocean Territory, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guam, Haiti, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, Northern Mariana Islands, Palau, Panama, Puerto Rico, Timor-Leste, Turks and Caicos Islands, United States, Virgin Islands, Bermuda (as well as Bermudian Dollar)

name: United States dollar (same day) (funds code) no longer used
CFA franc BEAC
countries: Cameroon, Central African Republic, Republic of the Congo, Chad, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon

name: European Unit of Account 9 (E.U.A.-9) (bond market unit)
European Unit of Account 17 (E.U.A.-17) (bond market unit)
East Caribbean dollar
countries: Anguilla, Antigua and Barbuda, Dominica, Grenada, Montserrat, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Saint Lucia, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

name: CFA Franc BCEAO
countries: Benin, Burkina Faso, C?te d'Ivoire, Guinea-Bissau, Mali, Niger, Senegal, Togo

name: CFP franc
countries: French Polynesia, New Caledonia, Wallis and Futuna
